short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically Skip ads on YouTube. This is not an ad blocker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip YouTube ads when the ad is able to be skipped. When an ad has the option to be skipped within 5 seconds the extension will skip the ad for you immediately. This does not block ads or skip ads that do not originally have the option to be skipped.
